titleStmt.title: The certainty of heavenly and the uncertainty of earthly treasures together with a discovery where the treasure and heart is placed / as it was delivered in severall sermons by that eminently faithfull servant of Christ, Mr. William Strong ...
titleStmt.author: Strong, William, d. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson ... and are to be sold by Francis Tyton ...,
